title: Imitations of Horace - main point about writers

content.question: The main point made about writers and poets in lines 21â€“28 is that they

choices.label: feel no need to study and learn their art
will never achieve the greatness of people in other professions

content.answer: feel no need to study and learn their art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
